name: TalkofUnitedStatesTrivia
0:
”Alexa, open Talk of United States Trivia”

skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: talk of united states trivia
Developer Terms of Use
des:
This is a fun game to not only learn about state capitals, but also to learn the accents of the states. Hope you enjoy!

If you don't know the answer, please say "I don't know".
